trans-unit.source: Defines the attribute that indicates whether a control is treated as a visual or non-visual control during design time.
trans-unit.target: 定義屬性，指出是否視為 visual 或非視覺控制項的設計階段。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The NonVisualControlAttribute attribute is applied to controls that are not rendered to the client, such as data source controls and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: NonVisualControlAttribute 屬性會套用到不會呈現給用戶端，例如資料來源控制項的控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: During design time, a page developer might decide to hide all non-visual controls.
trans-unit.target: 在設計階段期間網頁開發人員可能會決定要隱藏所有非視覺控制項。

trans-unit.source: The designer would mark as invisible all of the controls with the NonVisualControlAttribute attribute set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具會將標示為不可見的所有控制項 NonVisualControlAttribute 屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Examples of controls that employ the NonVisualControlAttribute attribute are <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>.
trans-unit.target: 採用 NonVisualControlAttribute 屬性的控制項範例有<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A default instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute> class is equivalent to the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.NonVisual> field, or passing `true` to the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 預設執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute>類別相當於<xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.NonVisual>欄位或傳遞`true`至<xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.NonVisual> </xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> class, using the specified Boolean value to determine whether the attribute represents a visual or non-visual control.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref>類別，使用指定的布林值，判斷屬性是否代表 visual 或非視覺控制項。

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` to this constructor is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.NonVisual> field, and passing `false` is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.Visual> field.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`true`此建構函式相當於使用<xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.NonVisual>欄位，以及傳遞`false`相當於使用<xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.Visual>欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.Visual> </xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.NonVisual>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to initialize the <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> to represent a Web control that is not rendered to the client at run time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>初始化<xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref>來代表 Web 控制項，則不會呈現在用戶端執行時間，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> instance that represents the application-defined default value of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref>執行個體，表示屬性的應用程式定義的預設值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: A default instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute> class is equivalent to the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute> field.
trans-unit.target: 預設執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute>類別相當於<xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute>欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個執行個體是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> to compare with this instance or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>比較與這個執行個體或 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if obj equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 具有相同的類型和值，這個執行個體; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current instance is equivalent to a default instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出目前的執行個體是否相等的預設執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current instance is equivalent to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.Default"></xref> instance of the class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前的執行個體相當於<xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.Default"></xref>類別執行個體，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control is non-visual.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否為非視覺化。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has been marked as non-visual; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項已標示為非視覺;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> instance that is applied to a Web control to be treated as a non-visual control during design time.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref>套用至 Web 控制項，以被視為非視覺控制項在設計階段期間的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The NonVisual field is equivalent to creating an instance of the attribute using the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor and passing `true` as the parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏的欄位相當於建立執行個體的屬性使用<xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>建構函式，並傳遞`true`當做參數值。</xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> instance that is applied to a Web control to be treated as a visual control during design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref>套用至 Web 控制項，以被視為視覺化控制項在設計階段期間的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The Visual field is equivalent to creating an instance of the attribute using the default <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor?displayProperty=fullName> constructor, or creating an instance of the attribute using the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor and passing `false` as the parameter value.
trans-unit.target: Visual 欄位相當於建立使用預設屬性的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor?displayProperty=fullName>建構函式，或建立執行個體的屬性使用<xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>建構函式，並傳遞`false`當做參數值。</xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
